backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining localized game, quiz, puzzle, sound, and coloring data types with storage maps and helpers for language-specific text conversion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file listing translation-related requirements for French and German UI dictionaries and associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files describing their roles and features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode overrides, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing navigation, age selection, and global providers for queries, theming, and language.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationModal: Celebration modal displaying confetti, messages, and retry/continue actions after completing games or quizzes.
frontend/src/components/coloring/Colorin: Interactive coloring canvas with brush, zoom, undo history, and image template loading logic.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with decorative animated star and sparkle icons.
frontend/src/components/games/LogicPuzzl: Generates and manages logic puzzles by age group, tracks progress, and handles localized puzzle content.
frontend/src/components/games/MathPuzzle: Creates age‑appropriate math problems with multiple‑choice answers and tracks scoring through a short quiz.
frontend/src/components/games/MemoryCard: Memory matching game using themed emoji card sets, managing flips, matches, and completion state.
frontend/src/components/games/ProblemSol: Presents scenario‑based problem‑solving questions by age group and category, tracking score and progression.
frontend/src/components/games/QuickReact: Implements a timed tap-reaction game that generates random targets per round and tracks score until all rounds finish.
frontend/src/components/games/ShapeMatch: Provides a shape‑matching memory game with difficulty varying by age group and tracks matched pairs and moves.
frontend/src/components/games/SortingCla: Implements a drag‑and‑sort style classification game where items are sorted into age‑appropriate categories.
frontend/src/components/games/VisualReco: Runs a find‑the‑difference visual game with randomly placed differences and scene switching based on age group.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing branding, language selector, and optional back-to-home button.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown language selector allowing users to switch among ten supported languages with flags.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Manages global language state with persistence and maps UI languages to backend enum values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides multiple React Query hooks for fetching games, questions, and messages from the backend based on age group and language mappings.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomizedQuizQues: Defines a hook that fetches randomized quiz questions from the backend using age group, language, and count.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based styles with a colorful children-friendly theme and custom animations.
frontend/src/lib/coloringFallbackTemplat: Contains structured fallback coloring template metadata for each age group with strict outline-only image requirements.
frontend/src/lib/dailySurprise.ts: Implements deterministic daily surprise game selection per age group with localStorage caching.
frontend/src/lib/fallbackQuizQuestions.t: Provides large multilingual fallback quiz question pools organized by age group.
frontend/src/lib/imageCache.ts: Empty file reserved for future image caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/quizQuestionSelection.t: Offers utilities for shuffling, selecting quiz subsets, and managing repeat-reduction via localStorage history.
frontend/src/lib/translations.ts: Defines supported language codes and a large dictionary of common UI translation strings used throughout the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ColoringZone.tsx: Renders the coloring zone, loading templates from backend or fallbacks and displaying a canvas for coloring.
frontend/src/pages/GameZone.tsx: Loads available games, lets users pick one, and renders the selected game with celebration handling on completion.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the welcome screen, mascot, and age selection UI, then navigates to games, quiz, or coloring sections.
frontend/src/pages/QuizZone.tsx: Runs the quiz flow using backend or fallback questions with history-aware selection, showing progress and results.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, containers, and plugins for the app's design system.
project_state.json: Defines the localization project state, including existing French and German translation feature tasks and a pending request to add full translation files. Contains metadata, notes, and versioning for project tracking.
